In such cases, Skilljar may constitute a "service provider" or a "data processor" to the company, and we process personal information to the extent permitted and directed by the "data controller" or the "business" that controls your personal information.
Once the business purposes for which the personal information was collected is/are no longer applicable, we will retain that personal information for no longer than reasonably necessary and proportionate to fulfill the purposes for which we originally collected or processed that personal information.
